original_text: Then Joseph hurried out, for his compassion grew warm for his brother, and he sought a place to weep. And he entered his chamber and wept there.
korean_text: 요셉이 아우를 사랑하는 마음이 복받쳐 급히 울 곳을 찾아 안방으로 들어가서 울고

sentences.original_text: for his compassion grew warm for his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 형제에 대한 긍휼이 불타올랐기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and he sought a place to weep
